name: Reddit - Easy Hide Links + Other Small Tweaks
description: Adds a way to hide links on reddit easier ( shamelessly ripped off of style 45085, except his didn't work for me ), as well as other little things. Isn't perfect but it's what I use and you can too. I suggest you install the brilliant style 36717 as well, as that's what I use and while I check for compatibility with normal reddit, it'll all just look better if you use that.
